2020-01-22 19:39
With @Netlify Redirects, you can proxy every URL you're not serving to somewhere else. 📚 https://t.co/TJTjkz73Ir Perfect for gradually migrating or adding JAMstack to your existing stack. Watch me set this up in under 2 minutes for my own cheeky version of the @css home page. https://t.co/IYz76fT7Kb
